definition: good/well/proper/good to/easy to/very/so/(suffix indicating completion or readiness)/(of two people) close/on intimate terms/(after a personal pronoun) hello
to be fond of/to have a tendency to/to be prone to

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐立不安了好幾個小時，等着裁判們決定獲勝者。

sentences.english: Mr Green has been out of work for several months and is on his uppers.
sentences.chinese: 格林先生失業好幾個月了，現在已過得山窮水盡。

sentences.english: It rained yesterday after it had been dry for many months.
sentences.chinese: 在天旱了好幾個月之後，昨天下雨了。

sentences.english: This grave matron had several sorts of practice.
sentences.chinese: 這位假正經的婦人有好幾種慣做的事情。

sentences.english: Try to pacify the child, he's been crying for hours.
sentences.chinese: 快哄哄孩子，他哭了好幾個鐘頭了。

sentences.english: It is years since I enjoyed myself so much.
sentences.chinese: 我好幾年沒玩得這樣痛快了。

sentences.english: FROST】Frost has killed several of our young plants.
sentences.chinese: 霜已搞壞了我們好幾株幼苗。

sentences.english: Ali was the cock of the walk for many years in boxing circles .
sentences.chinese: 阿里在拳擊圈裏當了好幾年的頭號人物。

sentences.english: For centuries, Chinese wealth and power dwarfed the West’s.
sentences.chinese: 在好幾個世紀裏，中國的財富和權勢傲視西方。

sentences.english: There are several vacant plots available for building on in the area.
sentences.chinese: 那個地區還有好幾塊空地皮可以用來造房子。

sentences.english: He went deep several times in the final game.
sentences.chinese: 在比賽最後的時候，他打了好幾支全壘打。

sentences.english: They dickered for hours over some of the details of the agreement.
sentences.chinese: 他們就協議的某些細節討價還價了好幾鐘頭。

sentences.english: Several methods are taken in US universities to stop students' plagiarizing on line.
sentences.chinese: 美國大學採取好幾種方法來阻止學生在網絡上面抄襲。

sentences.english: Uncle Sam entertains/amuses the children for hours at a time.
sentences.chinese: 薩姆叔叔一連好幾小時地逗孩子們樂。

sentences.english: This dictionary has been put together by several persons.
sentences.chinese: 這部詞典是由好幾個人合編成的。

sentences.english: Work on bioartificial liver devices has been under way for several years.
sentences.chinese: 生物人工肝裝置的研究工作已經進行了好幾年。

definition: the rice is cooked/what's done is done/it's too late to change anything now (idiom)
pinyin: sheng1 mi3 zhu3 cheng2 shu2 fan4

definition: lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom)/fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation
pinyin: si3 ma3 dang4 huo2 ma3 yi1

definition: to bore/to burrow/to crawl through a tunnel
lit. firing after the horse/fig. belated action/giving advice in hindsight
the cap of a pen, pencil or writing brush/the sheath of a pen (made of cloth, silk or thread)
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
what remains unseen is deemed to be clean/what the eye doesn't see, the heart doesn't grieve over (idiom)
with dishevelled hair (idiom)/with one's hair down
